description: The Kalalau Trail is an 11 mile trail that leads from Ke?e Beach to Kalalau Beach along the Na Pali Coast on the island of Kauai in Hawaii.  The Kalalau Trail is part of the Hawaii State Parks system.
directions: The beginning of the Kalalau Trail is located on the north side of Kauai, next to Ke?e Beach inside the Ha?ena State Park. To reach the trailhead, travel 41 miles (1.5 hour drive) from the Lihu?e Airport to the northwest end of Kuhio Highway (Route 56).There is parking available, but unless you arrive early in the morning you may not find a spot close to the trailhead. Many car break-ins are reported at the trailhead, so parking overnight is not recommended. Facilities at the Kalalau Trailhead include restrooms, trash bins, outdoor showers, drinking water and a payphone.
title: Kalalau Trail
